outputs.output_descr:
This project will develop the individual, institutional systemic capacity of the Government of St. Vincent and the Grenadines and the ozone technican association to successfully complete the phase-out of ozone depleting substances by 2009.  The outputs associated with this project are:
Output 1. Establishment of a Monitoring, Evaluation and Reporting Mechanism.
Output 2. Enforcement of the Licensing Systems and Prevention of Illegal Trade.
Output 3. Training and Certification of Technicians and Establisment  of an Association of Refrigeration Tecnicians. 
Output 3. Provision of Equipment and Retrofit Demonstration.

project_descr: TERMINAL PHASE-OUT MANAGEMENT PLAN FOR CHLORO FLUORO CARBONS IN ST. VINCENT AND THE GRENADINES.
